# allowsToolTipsWhenApplicationIsInactive

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the window can display tooltips even when the application is in the background.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var allowsToolTipsWhenApplicationIsInactive: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the window can display tooltips even when the application is in the background; otherwise, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false]. The default is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false]. Changing the value of this property does not take effect until the window changes to an active state.
